Package com.vtls.opensource.utilities

Class Summary
DateUtilities A collection of utility functions for Date.
HttpSessionTrackerSingleton  
PagingIterator This class is an extended Iterator used for iterating paged elements
PreservingHashMap An object that maps keys to a List of values.
PropertiesSingleton  
ReplicatingInputStream This class performs the filtered replication for a givens source input stream.
StreamUtilities A collection of utility functions for getting input stream from different sources.
StringUtilities A collection of utility functions for String handling.
TinyDOMCreationHandler  
TinyJDOMCreationHandler A collection of utility functions for the XML JDOM Document.
URLEncoder Source: http://www.w3.org/International/URLUTF8Encoder.java Provides a method to encode any string into a URL-safe form.
Utilities A set of utility functions covering a few general input stream transformation and saving.
XMLUtilities A collection of utility functions for the XML JDOM Document.
